mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_notice_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx

SELECT n.clubNoticeIdx, m.userIdx, userId, userName, subject, content ,hitCount, n.created, n.saveFilename, n.originalFilename FROM club_notice_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE clubNoticeIdx = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE club_notice_${clubSeq} SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE clubNoticeIdx = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubNoticeIdx, subject FROM club_notice_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx
AND (clubNoticeIdx > #{num})
ORDER BY clubNoticeIdx ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT clubNoticeIdx, subject FROM club_notice_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberInfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx
AND (clubNoticeIdx < #{num})
ORDER BY clubNoticeIdx DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT clubNoticeIdx, m.userIdx, userName, subject, content ,hitCount, n.created, n.saveFilename, n.originalFilename FROM club_notice_${clubSeq} n JOIN memberinfo m ON n.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE m.userIdx = #{userIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_notice_reply_${clubSeq}(CNRIDX , CLUBNOTICEIDX, userIdx, content, answer) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{num},#{userIdx}, #{content}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_notice_reply_${clubSeq} WHERE clubNoticeIdx=#{num} AND answer=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT tbreply.CNRIDX as replyNum, clubNoticeIdx as num, userId, userName ,content, created, tbreply.answer ,NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount FROM ( ( SELECT cnridx, r.clubNoticeIdx, r.userIdx, userid, userName, r.content, r.created, answer FROM club_notice_reply_${clubSeq} r JOIN club_notice_${clubSeq} n ON r.clubNoticeIdx=n.clubNoticeIdx JOIN memberinfo m ON r.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE r.clubNoticeIdx=#{num} AND answer=0 ) tbreply LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT answer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM club_notice_reply_${clubSeq} GROUP BY answer ) tbanswer ON tbreply.CNRIDX = tbanswer.answer ) ORDER BY replyNum DESC
) tb WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE rnum >= #{start}

SELECT CNRIDX AS replyNum, clubNoticeIdx AS num, tbreply.userIdx, userName, content, created, answer FROM club_notice_reply_${clubSeq} tbreply JOIN memberInfo m ON tbreply.userIdx=m.userIdx WHERE answer=#{answer} ORDER BY replyNum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM club_notice_reply_${clubSeq} WHERE answer=#{answer}
